account-service-change-leverage-email-ac: changed leverage to {{leverage}}. This can take up to 5 minutes to be visible on the system.
account-service-create-demo-account-succ: Success, an email has been sent to {{userEmail}}
gateway-backend-service-waiting-for-user: Waiting for user to send bitcoins
gateway-backend-service-transaction-rece: Transaction is received by the network
gateway-backend-service-waiting-for-btc-: Waiting for confirmation from Bitcoin network
gateway-backend-service-your-name-should: Your name should match on both Vload and {{clientName}} profiles.
gateway-backend-service-use-voucher-belo: Please use a voucher which belongs to your own Vload account({{email}}), not someone else's voucher.
gateway-backend-service-waiting-for-appr: Waiting for approve or decline by crm admin
gateway-backend-service-error-occurred-w: an error occurred while calling the OLEpay gateway
marketing-service-user-is-not-eligible-f: User is not eligible for bonus
payment-service-withdraw-selfie-requeste: We require a selfie to continue to process your withdrawal. This must show your full face, valid proof of identity document, and a piece of paper with your withdrawal amount, withdrawal request date and signature.
payment-service-withdraw-awaiting-custom: Our Team have sent you an email as we require additional information to be able to process your withdrawal request.
payment-service-withdraw-pending-interna: We are reviewing your withdrawal for processing within 24 hours of your request.
payment-service-withdraw-pending-transfe: Our Team are reviewing your withdrawal for processing within 24 hours of your request.
payment-service-create-deposit-when-addr: Deposit created by re-using the previous crypto address
payment-service-reject-deposit-comment: deposit can't be processed by Gateway
payment-service-expect-to-see-funds-in-b: You should expect to see funds in your bank in 3-5 business days.
payment-service-expect-to-see-funds-refu: You should expect to see funds refunded to your card in the next 3-7 business days.
payment-service-expect-to-see-btc-in-wal: You should expect to see BTC in your wallet shortly.
payment-service-expect-to-receive-ach-cr: You should expect to receive an ACH credit to your account in the next 1-5 business days.
tradeor-service-wallet-has-been-credited: Your wallet has been credited with {{currency}}.
tradeor-service-support-deducted-withdra: Our support team has deducted {{amount}} from your wallet.
tradeor-service-deposit-approved-content: Your deposit request for the amount of {{requestedAmount}} has been approved for the amount of {{approvedAmount}}.
tradeor-service-withdraw-approved-conten: Your withdrawal request for {{requestedAmount}} has been approved for the amount of {{approvedAmount}}.
account-service-str-create-demo-account-: Success, an email has been sent to {{userEmail}}
